GitHub - sitemap

This is a blog about my Github experiments.
This aim to explain the structure of repositories and how to navigate between them.


Unreal Engine

Samples and drafts about code from udemy course “The Unreal Engine Developer Course”

  • Building Room
    A simple First Person game to learn level building, lighting, Unreal Editor, C++ game logic, basic Blueprint and more

  • Battle Tank
    An open-world head-to-head tank fight with simple AI, terrain, and advanced control system in Unreal 4

  • Testing Grounds
    A Hunger-Games inspired FPS with large outdoor terrains. Advanced AI, basic networking, pickups, skeletal meshes, checkpoints and more

C++

It’s a hard language to learn so it requires a lot of constant practice

  • Cast
    C++ cast <>() examples

  • Containers
    C++ Template Metaprogramming

  • Loki
    Source Code from great book: “Modern C++ Design: Generic Programming and Design Patterns Applied

  • Metaprogramming
    C++ Template Metaprogramming

  • Modern C++
    Nice walkthrough for C++, C++11/14/17, ..

  • Object Oriented Programming

  • RAII
    C++ Resource acquisition is initialization (RAII)

  • Smart Pointers
    Explore C++11 smartpointers

  • STL
    C++ Standard Template Library (STL)
